title: Iconic Celebrity Look

headings.text: How to Play Iconic Celebrity Look

controls: On Computers: Use your mouse to click on makeup tools, drag outfits onto the celebs, and select accessories.On Mobile: Tap and swipe to style, apply makeup, and choose the coolest outfits.
content.howToPlay: Start by choosing one of the four glamorous celebrities.Head to the makeup station and create a look! Pick eyeshadow, eyeliner, blush, and lipstick to make them shine.After makeup, it’s time for the wardrobe! Choose dresses, shoes, bags, and even sparkly jewelry to match their style.Add the final touches with a gorgeous hairstyle, then watch them strut their stuff on the red carpet!Don’t forget to replay with a different star to try new looks and styles!
content.developer: Iconic Celebrity Look game was created by FreezeNova for everyone who loves fashion, makeup, and Hollywood glm. If you dream of being a stylist, this is totally for you!

fullContent: Home› GirlIconic Celebrity LookBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenOMG, have you ever wanted to be a celebrity stylist? In Iconic Celebrity Look, you get to glam up four superstars who look just like Selena Gomez, Demi Lovato, Ariana Grande, and Taylor Swift! Your job is to do their makeup, pick the perfect outfits, and make them the queens of the red carpet in Hollywood. It’s like having your own VIP styling salon, and the results are sooo fab—you won’t want to stop playing!ControlsOn Computers: Use your mouse to click on makeup tools, drag outfits onto the celebs, and select accessories.On Mobile: Tap and swipe to style, apply makeup, and choose the coolest outfits.How to Play Iconic Celebrity LookStart by choosing one of the four glamorous celebrities.Head to the makeup station and create a look! Pick eyeshadow, eyeliner, blush, and lipstick to make them shine.After makeup, it’s time for the wardrobe! Choose dresses, shoes, bags, and even sparkly jewelry to match their style.Add the final touches with a gorgeous hairstyle, then watch them strut their stuff on the red carpet!Don’t forget to replay with a different star to try new looks and styles!Dress Up CelebritiesIconic Celebrity Look has sooo many options! You can create endless combinations of outfits and makeup styles. There are glittery dresses, chic accessories, and trendy hairstyles. Plus, their reactions on the red carpet are so cute—it’s like they know they look amazing because of you!DeveloperIconic Celebrity Look game was created by FreezeNova for everyone who loves fashion, makeup, and Hollywood glm. If you dream of being a stylist, this is totally for you!More Fashion GamesIf you loved giving these stars their glow-up, check out other fun games like Frozen Sisters Dream Wedding or Barbiemania. They’re perfect if you want to keep creating fabulous looks!This article was updated on November 29, 20241 Player2DDress UpFashionFreeGirlHTML5KidsMakeupMobileMouse
